long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your browsing with Ampersand, an extension that brings comprehensive stock market information wherever you go!

Utilize a powerful tool which highlights over 3,000 publicly traded companies and stock tickers on the New York Stock Exchange and NASDAQ, creating interactable overlays that you can use to produce useful and resizable in-window tabs with all of the charting abilities you could ask for. Need more information? Ampersand also gives you easy access to more in depth financial data with a link right in the tab, letting you gain more information with just a click.


Latest Update: Beta Version 0.215


Features & Changes:

-Redesigned settings panel.

-Added a frequency setting to adjust how much highlights will appear on a page.

-Made some slight adjustments to the terms Ampersand can highlight.


Patches & Fixes:

-Fixed a bug which would result in the resizing of tabs breaking the webpage (oops).

-Fixed a bug which resulted in the height of the highlights not properly being calculated.

-Fixed a bug which resulted in error messages being sent (although said error messages were actually completely benign).

-Fixed a bug which would cause webpages to freeze while using Ampersand if they were too large.
